title: Outliers E7 - Detained
description:
After Boy wakes in captivity, he is interrogated by a military doctor, during which he learns more harrowing truths about the man who raised him. 

For more shows like this, visit Realm.fm, and sign up for our newsletter while you're there!

Adrenaline: Outliers is a Realm production. Listen away.
